data.yamlPipeline:
pipeline:
  name: testPipeline_Cypress
  identifier: testPipeline_Cypress
  projectIdentifier: Satyam_Onboarding
  orgIdentifier: default
  tags: {}
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Jenkins
        identifier: Jenkins
        description: ""
        type: Custom
        spec:
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: JenkinsBuild
                  name: jenkinsStep
                  identifier: jenkinsStep
                  spec:
                    connectorRef: testConnector2
                    jobName: <+input>
                    jobParameter: <+input>
                    delegateSelectors: []
                    unstableStatusAsSuccess: false
                    captureEnvironmentVariable: false
                  timeout: 10m
        tags: {}
